basic.description:
A study of representative literary works of the 15th and 16th centuries, including Villon, Montaigne, Rabelais. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 405/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Introduction à la littérature française de la Renaissance

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    6.0 units from FREN212 or FREN220 or FREN221 and registration in a FREN Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN315; FREN405.
